title: My Quest for Social Intelligence: 6 Things I'm Learning
author: Kenji
content:
Member-only story

My Quest for Social Intelligence: 6 Things I'm Learning

A personal journey toward better relationships and emotional understanding

Kenji

I've always considered myself reasonably intelligent when it comes to academic and professional pursuits. But a few years ago, I realized there was a significant gap in my development: social intelligence.

While I could solve complex problems at work, I sometimes struggled to navigate interpersonal dynamics, read emotional cues, and build the deep relationships I wanted in my life. This realization set me on a deliberate path to develop my social intelligenceâ€”the ability to understand, connect with, and influence others positively.
